title: Simplify Tag page stats and make the global header fully opaque

requirements.text: Update the Tag detail page to remove the “Total Activity” and “Last Activity” fields from the UI (including their labels, icons, and values).

quotes: Remove total activity and last activity from the tag view page.

acceptanceCriteria: On /tag/:tag, the tag stats block no longer shows “Total Activity” or “Last Activity”.
No empty/placeholder layout gaps remain where those fields were previously rendered.
The tag page continues to load and render the tag name, lily count, sort tabs, and lily list as before.

requirements.text: Remove transparency effects from the global top header so it renders fully opaque (no translucent background and no backdrop blur-based translucency).

quotes: Also remove the transparency from the header

acceptanceCriteria: The header background is fully opaque in both light and dark mode (no alpha background classes like bg-*/xx).
The header no longer uses backdrop blur styling to create translucent effects.
Header remains sticky and continues to render navigation/search controls correctly across pages.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to backend tag stats APIs or data models.
No redesign of the Tag Hub page (/tags) beyond the requested removals.
No changes to search behavior or routing.
